ability.name: Fulcrum
ability.flavor: You precisely manipulate the creatures around you.
ability.target: Each enemy and object in the area

metadata.flavor: You precisely manipulate the creatures around you.
metadata.target: Each enemy and object in the area

effects.effect: Make a power roll to determine the area of this ability. Each target is vertical pushed 6 squares. You can target only objects of size 1L or smaller.
You can choose to reduce the size of the burst by 2 (to a minimum of 1 burst) to give the forced movement distance a +2 bonus. You take half the total damage all targets take from forced movement.
